MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the L32 postcode area of Kirkby, affecting properties in Morston Walk, Morston Crescent and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 4.53PM. We are aware of the previous power cuts affecting your area and we apologise for this. Our engineers are on their way to the area to investigate a suspected underground cable fault. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 8.00PM. Once they arrive, or when we receive any update regarding the cause, we will update this message. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5.01PM on 10th December 2020
